title: How Prophet Did Tasbih
description: Authentic supplications for How Prophet Did Tasbih
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for How Prophet Did Tasbih. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 266
items.arabic: عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَمْرٍو رضي الله عنه قَالَ: ((رَأَيْتُ النَّبيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم يَعْقِدُ التَّسْبِيحَ)) وفي زيادةٍ: ((بِيَمِينِهِ)).
